TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsDocument extends System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsPartBase implements class System.IDisposable
Public Class XpsDocument Inherits XpsPartBase Implements IDisposable
type XpsDocument = class inherit XpsPartBase interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: Provides a that holds the content of an XPS document.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>包含<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>，包含一或多個<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>項目。
<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A>的參考傳遞給建構函式<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>用於撰寫、 儲存及讀取文件的內容項目。
新的空白[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>建立使用<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。
現有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>開啟使用<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。
A<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>根加入空[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A>方法。
<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> 印表機資訊與控制的項目也會與相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>，或個別<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>中儲存的項目<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。
如需有關[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]看到 XML Paper Specification (XPS) 下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

Docs.summary: Closes the XPS document .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>已針對寫入存取，資料的緩衝區寫入存放區和實體的文件開啟<xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>已關閉。
之後<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.Close%2A>已呼叫，文件的任何部分使用可以存取這<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>執行個體。
## Examples 下列範例示範如何開啟、 插入內容，並關閉<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

Docs.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the and optionally, releases the managed resources.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。 `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。 <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。
當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>參考。 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。

block.para: 可以呼叫其他物件多次。當您覆寫，請小心不要參考到所要的早期呼叫中先前處置的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需有關和，請參閱 [清理 Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 上和 [覆寫 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

Docs.param: The X.509 certificate to use in signing each part; or to prompt the user to select an installed certificate.
to store the certificate in the package; otherwise, .
Flags that indicate what dependent parts must be excluded from the signing.

Docs.returns: An that contains information about the signature.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果`certificate`是`null`，會出現一個對話方塊，可讓使用者選取已安裝的 X.509 憑證，例如，從智慧卡讀卡機。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果`certificate`是`null`，會顯示對話方塊，可讓使用者選取已安裝的 X.509 憑證，例如，從智慧卡讀卡機。
<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException> 如果擲回`certificate`是`null`和未安裝任何憑證。
## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> 方法。
[!code-csharp[XpsReadWriteSign#SignXpsDocument](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/CSharp/SignatureDefinitionsAndSigning.cs#signxpsdocument)] [!code-vb[XpsReadWriteSign#SignXpsDocument](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/visualbasic/signaturedefinitionsandsigning.vb#signxpsdocument)]

Docs.summary: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. Use the type-safe method instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Xps::Packaging::XpsThumbnail ^ Thumbnail { System::Windows::Xps::Packaging::XpsThumbnail ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Xps::Packaging::XpsThumbnail ^ value); };
member this.Thumbnail : System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] thumbnail image that is associated with the document.
Docs.value: ，代表文件相關聯的縮圖影像。
